name: Wisionaire
description:
Wisionaire v.Beta

This game create as a test & practice purpose

Topic : 2D,  Live 2D, Dialouge system, Mobile app, Notification system practice

Team Type : Solo

Time Used on This ver.  : 6+ day (estimate)    

------------------ About Game  ------------------

It's a questionnaire game with 3 helpers from cute glasses girl!!

the rule is simple : To be winner choose the correct answer within the time limit for all 10 questions or you lose (and maybe go educate yourself before trying again! ;))

------------------ How To Play ------------------

It's Mobile Game so download the APK  below and install it on your device.

In First Page : Select desired Time to create the notification and also set the available time to play. 
In Gameplay : Touch the screen to select things.

Please Check on ScreenShot for more detail.

---------------------------------------------------

Thank you for testing my prototype!

-SunraymanZ-
